name: Farming Ain't Easy
description:
#Game a Week

Farming Aint Easy is an arcade game made inside of Unreal Engine 5. You control a farmer who must sell as many plants as he can within a time limit.  Luckily selling those veggies will give him more time, plus he has some helpers who can make the job a bit easier.

Movement -WASD

Interact - E

Switch Seed type to plant - Arrow Up and Down or Mouse Wheel

Thank you for playing my game.
